newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash bug when pressing shift key and selecting an end node without first selecting a start node.
== Enhancements ==
* Refactored Contacts code to remove excess calls to CharacterInfo and CorporationSheet which are now redundant. * Revised the logic of contract's visibility. Now also the acceptor can see the status of a contract.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
